37.eng-name: The Book of Fighting [The Prohibition of Bloodshed]

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdullah bin 'Amr bin Al-'As said:"The Messenger of Allah [SAW] said: 'By the One in Whose Hand is my soul, killing a believer is more grievous before Allah than the extinction of the whole world

chapter.eng-name: The Gravity of the Sin of Shedding Blood
